text: Hi Sibling, I've been really worried about Michael lately. He's been so distant at home. Have you noticed anything at school that might be causing this?
Morning Sibling, hope you're doing well. Just checking in to see if there's any news about Michael? He's been really anxious about the bullying and the exams are just around the corner.
Hey, just wanted to say thanks for looking out for Michael. It means a lot to our family, especially with the bullying he's faced and his fears about not doing well on his exams.
Do you think you could talk to Michael? He's been locking himself in his room after school and won't talk to me. I'm concerned it's because of the bullying and his worry about the exams.
